title: James Cotton - [1994] Feelin' Good (FLAC)
description:
James Cotton - Feelin' Good (FLAC)
Release Date: 1996


Review by Cub Koda:
Pulled off of vinyl from various mid-'60s albums, here are ten tracks of Cotton in fine form, backed by his regular working band. Cotton storms through classics like "Off the Wall," "Don't Start Me to Talkin'," "Sweet Sixteen," and the title cut. The tracks are literally swimming in reverb, but the band blows hard and heavy; for a budget set, you could do a lot worse.



Track List:
1. Off the Wall
2. Don't Start Me Talkin'
3. Dealing With the Devil
4. The Creeper
5. You Know It Ain't Right
6. Feelin' Good
7. Knock on Wood
8. Sweet Sixteen
9. I Need You So Bad
10. 'fore Day Creep
